name: Super Collapse! 3
description:
In Super Collapse! 3, find groups of three or more like-colored blocks touching each other, then use the X button to make them disappear. Earn points for removing groups of three or more like-colored blocks. Earn bonus points by eliminating larger groups of blocks or clearing the entire board. In most modes, you beat a level by preventing the blocks from filling the screen.

In Quest! you can buy Special Items in the Shop with coins earned, except for the Gravity Bomb. They will appear in your Special Items box. To access a Special Items, hold down the R button and use the Directional buttons to select an item. Press the X button to activate the item.

In Quest!, select any area available on the Quest! Map to enter. There is a Casino in every area of the game. Playing costs you coins, which are earned by completing levels and winning casino games. There’s a Shop in each area where you can buy Special Items and Quick Play game modes.

In Quick Play, you can play seven game modes. When you begin, only Classic Mode is unlocked. Unlock the rest by beating Quest! levels.

Battle against other players in multiplayer mode. You can host your own two-player game or search for an existing one.



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item.
